author: Darren F
comment: Watch shop showed this as use for LG G watch r.  Bottom is missing for the Motorola flat tyre.  Removing app now  =(

author: Cory Capps
comment: Love this watchface- would be nice to be able to make the hour and min hands a little less beefy- their size relative to the dail makes them look a bit toony.
title: Good Design.. Just one thing-

author: Phillip Leman
comment: Actually a kewl looking watch face for my moto360! Glad I decided to purchase this one.
title: Wow

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Today,I've done big update for the battery it's life can be extended.
Would you please check and install the latest version of the app.
Thank you.

title: Nice but

author: Chris Coffee
comment: I love this whole concept but need be able to customize - hand colors, what appears where AND search images on Google for "top ten moto 360 watch faces". Where are these?! I love +2342 ...developers think beyond the mechanical limitations that a few engineers bound us to during the dark ages.
title: Developers please read

author: Steve Matsui
comment: I loved the look of the watch face. Adding other color options for the full face would be nice but the biggest problem is I got a third of my normal battery life as compared to the stock faces

title: Cool looking power hog
